name: Phyto
storyline:
The tree of life is attacked by hordes of Nibblers!
Defend it by growing and mutating various kinds of plants: from simple leaf that slaps hard the insects to carnivorous plants that devours armor and bulbs that use its roots to slow down the evil creatures, you can choose lot of "weapons" to use!
Master the power of your flowers too, to get active skill to use on the battlefield!
Go over 100 levels and find your way up to the Tree of Life, upgrade your plants and flowers and get them unique passives skills. You can unlock mutation for each base plant and each mutation keeps all the previous plants upgrades... so think about all the possibilities it brings!
summary: Grow and evolve 32 different plants in this tower defense! Unlock new skills an units by finding seeds throughout 100 levels. Replay each map as much as possible, to push the challenge and rewards even further!
